Text: why would you rip this at 128kbps?
Because I'm not an audiophile and I don't want to have to buy another hard drive to store my music.
listening to the soft bulletin in 128kbps is worse than not listening to it at all. the drums must sound like shit. oh god i dont even wanna know.

it's definitely a bad idea to lower the quality of a release that was made specifically to enhance the original listening experience.

Very poor choice. 

If you are looking for the 5.1 rereleases, look elsewhere.
